library(DiagrammeR) 
library(DiagrammeRsvg) 
library(rsvg) 

grViz("digraph{

      subgraph cluster_0 {
        graph[shape = rectangle]
        style = rounded
        bgcolor = Gold
        label = 'Sistemáticas'
        node[shape = rectangle, fillcolor = LemonChiffon, margin = 0.25]
        F[label = 'Aparatos mal calibrados,

      }
      
      subgraph cluster_2 {
        graph[shape = rectangle]
        style = rounded
        bgcolor = Gold

        node[shape = rectangle, fillcolor = LemonChiffon, margin = 0.25]

      }
  
      subgraph cluster_1 {

  subgraph cluster_3 {

dispositivos de medida.']

      D -> F    D -> G

      }")
